author: chris2_2_2
content: I noticed on the ETH website that ETH miners are not listed as part of the ETH community. Stakers, holders, developers, finance, etc. but no mining or miners or even pools. https://ethereum.org/en/community/

author: chris2_2_2
content: Does this mean that pools and miners are not considered part of the ETH community? Or was this overlooked. I'm asking for a straight yes or no answer, thank you.

author: chat-bridge
content: <vbuterin> yes, miners are part of the community

author: chris2_2_2
content: Awesome, can I ask that the website be updated? Thank you. PS: I think this 1559 discussion is great for laying groundwork for the merge.

author: Deleted User
content: <@!636289909359116290> You can also propose the change by creating PR to this file: https://github.com/ethereum/ethereum-org-website/blob/dev/src/content/community/index.md (Disclamer: I am not maintaining the web-site, but I suspect the change may happen quicker if you make PR yourself)
